price: 32. Mpe bopusana pene na ekobo te, ya sólo, yango ezali mbindo mpe nzela ya mabe.
arabic: وَلَا تَقۡرَبُواْ ٱلزِّنَىٰٓۖ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ فَٰحِشَةٗ وَسَآءَ سَبِيلٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walā taqrabū al-zinā innahu kāna fāḥishatan wasāa sabīlan
